channel.title: To be or not to be: that is the question
channel.description:
If you're trying to find if a named value exists in a collection, you can use `find?` now for all of these
* If there is a named member in a block! * If there is a named member in an object! * If there is a named member in a map!
`find? something 'element`

item.title: To be or not to be: that is the question
item.dc:creator: gchiu
item.description:
If you're trying to find if a named value exists in a collection, you can use find? now for all of these

  • If there is a named member in a block!
  • If there is a named member in an object!
  • If there is a named member in a map!

find? something 'element

Read full topic
item.source: To be or not to be: that is the question
